The video was published on Facebook on O: 2019, and has been viewed over 63,000 times and shared over 2,400 times.
The video: s caption in Hindi translates to English as a rare and original video of Swami Vivekananda's speech delivered in Chicago, USA, on September 13, 1893, saving the sinking Sanatana religion.
The claim is false: as the video actually shows an actor impersonating Vivekananda in a Hindi film released in 2011, which can be found on YouTube.
Evidence from India: s film certification board confirms that the film featuring the actor impersonating Vivekananda was indeed released in 2011.
